column2: I really enjoy working with Kafka Streams! Thank you @lucapette for the suggestion #kafka #streaming
How to take smart notes is a great #book. I can see now why @foo wanted me and @bar to read it
I'm not so sure the answer is 42. What if it's 24? #life #meaning
Did you folks watch #severance? It's really mind-blowing. Thanks @apple!
Do I know anyone using #kafka with #OpenCV? Really interested in the intersection of #ML and #streaming.
I'm reading the three-body problem. What a #book!
